forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning giving way to a few showers late. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning giving way to a few showers late. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. N winds shifting to E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
